attributes.review: This is a very scary experience that gives me trauma to write out but this app MUST be taken down. I installed the app because I’m deeply in love with Donald J Trump. Once I get it it takes me to login in and of course I do so but then out of nowhere I heard a voice coming from my phone. It looked like someone was looking at me through the camera and I heard them say “Oh god! Not a colored person”. I gasped as I realize the voice was no others then Mr.Trumps. He continues saying “I don’t want no negro on my app, I don’t want no negro on this Earth” and proceeds to come up my house. He tried running up to me but his fat chubby legs made him wobble instead. He then yelled “NEGRO NEGRO” and tried to shoot me with his very expensive gun. I quickly ran inside but sadly he shot my goldfish who was the same color as him. I tried to call the police but realized they’d shoot me on spot because I’m black so I resorted to the firefighters. I’m all good now but if you are black DO NOT GET THIS APP PLEASE! Thank u luvs😍
attributes.title: Cheeto almost murdered me

attributes.review: thought I would download this app to have a good ol time but instead I see nothing but glitches and as soon as I closed the app and reopened it a see a stanky picture of the old Cheeto man. -100/10 would not recommend. 🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.title: Tragic.

attributes.review: The first thing i saw when i opened the app were people being nude. As i went on to see more of the app trump supporters were suggesting i should jump off a cliff.They said if i didn’t they would kill my family and eat my dog for breakfast😔!! This app should be taken down immediately!
